thread.title: Spring break 2017
thread.title_full: Spring break 2017 - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CPDDave
title: Spring break 2017
text: Great trip to NYC with my 8 year old, very nice property and fantastic staff close to everything. Directly across from port authority bus and subway terminal, two blocks from Times Square proper, 1 block from Hellls kitchen (more little restaurants than you can handle) had some trouble with the wifi, but the free breakfast and afternoon snacks made up for it!
